input.sentences: we had a mardi gras parade downtown last weekend .
some very talented belly dancers danced by .
some people wore hardly any clothes .
finally the queen of the parade came by our station .
she had a harem with her | in bikinis and head dresses .
output.sentences: A huge colorful parade started in the city.
Hundreds of smiling people came marching down the street.
Onlookers lined the edge of the street to watch the dancers.
The Queen of the Parade came into view wearing her giant pink flamboyant dress and crown, signalling that the event was near complete.
The dancing finally came to an end and everyone flooded the streets to talk about the wonderful parade they had just seen.
